CodeCraft: JSON, Base64, Password, URL Encode, HTML Encode & UUID Tools

# Description:
CodeCraft is a must-have Chrome extension for developers! It includes a JSON formatter, Base64 encoder/decoder, URL and HTML encoder/decoder, password generator, UUID generator, and other handy utilities.

# Key Features:
- Support Dark Mode
- Simple Note
- Time Convert Tool
- JSON Formatter
- Base64 String Tool
- Base64 Image Tool
- HTML Encoder/Decoder
- URL Encoder/Decoder
- Backslash Escape Tool
- Password Generator
- UUID Generator
- Hash Tool

Stay Updated:
We're committed to continuous improvement and adding new features based on your feedback. Join our community on Discord to stay up-to-date with the latest updates, share your suggestions, and connect with other developers.

Join us now https://discord.gg/cKn2hTSh
